JobFullDesc: Our Design teams are focused not just on the functional, but also on joy and delight. Our work ignites opportunity and changes the way the world moves, and we design for users around the world of all backgrounds and abilities.About the RoleUber is building an Inclusive Design team and practice. Inclusive Design’s goal is to provide equitable experiences for everyone Uber serves. Help us cultivate and grow this practice, bringing underinvested communities to the forefront of Design at Uber!As an Inclusive Content Designer, you’ll work across products and fields and closely with partners to build accessible and inclusive experiences for all of Uber’s users. You’ll work to understand existing and potential problems and build solutions that center the goals, needs, and perspectives of underinvested communities. You’ll help teams form a shared understanding around aspects of how content and language impact accessibility and inclusion—delivering on the Inclusive Design component of the 14 anti-racism commitments we’ve made.You should be comfortable in uncharted territory as we are embarking on this product area for the first time, as the company continues to rapidly innovate and usher in an era where Uber enables you to go anywhere and get anything. We need your skills and passion to make it happen!What You'll DoCollaborate and design with underinvested communities to ensure their goals, needs, and perspectives are centered in your workAdapt and innovate design methods to meet accessibility and inclusion needs by delivering high-quality solutionsContribute to learning materials, resources, and workshops on how to successfully design with and for underinvested communitiesCollaborate with other researchers, designers, product managers, data scientists, marketing and operations managers, and engineers to ensure your designs provide a holistic view of our usersCommunicate the strategy and reasoning behind all content designs through rich storytellingContribute to establishing the Inclusive Design team at Uber and cultivate an internal culture with inclusive design at its foundationBasic QualificationsA portfolio of samples that demonstrate your skill and efficiency as a writer.A beginner’s mind. Humility, willingness to ask for help, and an eagerness to learn and grow. You approach everything with curiosity and are willing to change your mind when presented with new information.Impact driven. You are passionate about the outcomes and impact for all users, not just the few.
